price: 我替素莱曼制服狂风，它奉他的命令而吹到我曾降福的地方，我是深知万物的。
arabic: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walisulaymāna al-rīḥa ʿāṣifatan tajrī bi-amrihi ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā wakunnā bikulli shayin ʿālimīna
